data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 460 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mahe, Puducherry, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Mahe who will make disciples who make disciples.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Mahe.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Mahe, Puducherry, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Brahmin Sholiar people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Brahmin Sholiar people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Brahmin Sholiar people is yours.
Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Mahe.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 41,800 citizens of Mahe, Puducherry, India, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Mahe, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

location.name: Mahe
location.people_groups_list: Valan, Ambalavasi, Ambalavasi Kambalattu, Sardar (Hindu traditions), Vakkaliga Gangadikara
